meanings.definition: Clothing made of waterproof material treated with oil.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen wore oilskins to stay dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of oilskins for her hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: The oilskins made him look like a walking raincoat.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was her oilskins against the storm of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow oilskins stood out against the gray sky.

meanings.definition: A garment made of oilskin fabric.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his oilskins at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The vintage oilskins were a hit at the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The oilskins seemed to have a personality of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was her oilskins in the world of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The oilskins gleamed under the stage lights.

meanings.definition: A type of protective clothing worn in wet weather.
meanings.sent1: The hikers put on their oilskins before the storm hit.
meanings.sent2: Oilskins are essential for sailors facing rough seas.
meanings.sent3: The oilskins transformed him into a waterproof superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her optimism was her oilskins in the downpour of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The oilskins shielded him from the relentless rain.
